content:
the french send an ambassador to the US - Citizen Genêt
ordinarily an ambassador would come and present their credentials to the head of state to be received, but genet gets here and doesn’t do that

he sees the anti-washington headlines and he thinks that the country had disapproved over what washington had gone by ending the franco american alliance
instead of properly registering himself as an ambassador, he instead slowly made his way to philadelphia (where washington was) and openly recruited many US sailors and people to come and help the french cause in the french revolution
